Name: Alcatraz
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
7.5 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry and lightly bitter, this tequila-based sipper makes for a great apéritif cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Christin Wagner at La Petite Grocery, New Orleans, USA. Recipe courtesy of Gary "gaz" Regan 's Ardent Spirits .
Nutrition: One serving of Alcatraz contains 181 calories
